title: Desire
lyrics:
Stay with me forever
At least for the night
Even when you leave me, lead me to the light

You are my desire, oh
Oh, desire, oh
You, you take me higher, oh
Take me away
You are my desire, oh
Oh, desire, oh
You, you take me higher, oh
Take me away

Take me away

Promisе you won't wake me
Beforе you leave
Leave me in a daydream
Just you and me

Stay with me forever
At least for the night
Even when you leave me, lead me to the light

You are my desire, oh
Oh, desire, oh
You, you take me higher, oh
Take me away
You are my desire, oh
Oh, desire, oh
You, you take me higher, oh
Take me away

Take me away
